text: Joseph Salem Lelyveld (5 April 1937 â€“ 5 January 2024) was an American journalist from Cincinnati, Ohio. He was the editor of the New York Times from 1994 to 2001. He received the Pulitzer Prize in 1986 for Move Your Shadow: South Africa, Black and White. ==Personal life== Lelyveld was married to Carolyn Fox from 1959 until her death in 2004. They had two daughters. Lelyvald died from complications of Parkinson's disease at his home in Manhattan, on 5 January 2024.
